synopsis.text:
High above the net, a new star emerges in "Haikyu!! Lev Appears!" as Nekoma High's volleyball team welcomes Lev Haiba, a towering half-Japanese, half-Russian player. Despite his impressive stature, Lev struggles with basic volleyball techniques, much to the frustration of the team's skilled setter, Kenma Kozume. As the duo grapples with their mismatched talents, an unexpected opportunity arises: a practice match against Kunihira Senior High School. Can Kenma rise to the challenge and transform Lev's height into a formidable advantage?

Meanwhile, in "Haikyuu!!: Lev Genzan!", fans are treated to an original story that unveils an intriguing aspect of a beloved character. Following the events of the first season, Hinata and Kageyama face a tough decision when their make-up exam clashes with their training camp.

Prepare for thrilling volleyball action and engaging character development in these exciting installments of the Haikyu!! franchise.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
